# appEntityIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier of an app entity you set on framework types to make app content available to system experiences.

## Declaration

```swift
var appEntityIdentifier: EntityIdentifier? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to `nil` to clear the association between your [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEntity] and the system type that adopts [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEntityAnnotatable].
title: appEntityIdentifier
